name: Space Rock Story
description:
So this is one of my first complete game i plan to make more in different engines and possible make one from scratch using a graphics library. I need to learn more for sure, more math and programming techniques. My code could be cleaning but i'm in the beginning of my game programming journey. I will release the game files for this game soon. You will need game maker studio 2 in order to play around with what i made. You are free to use what i made to your own projects if using my art then just leave credit but code can be use freely.

Message me if there are issues with the game or game files.
